title: Migration balance in Belgium 2010 to 2018
summary: Overall Migration balance has decreased over the Year.

Migration balance is gradually decreasing from 2011 to 2013, slightly increasing from 2013 to 2014, slightly decreasing from 2014 to 2015, roughly constant from 2015 to 2017, and finally slightly increasing from 2017 to 2018.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2011 and 2012.
Maximum Migration balance, about 62157.0 was reported at Year 2011
Minimum Migration balance about 34843.0 was reached at Year 2013
min_summary: In general Migration balance has fallen over the Year.
